data.name: txtTongHopCongNoPhaiTra.EditValue
data.value:
--Tổng hợp công nợ phải trả DECLARE @TuNgay as datetime DECLARE @DenNgay as datetime
set dateformat dmy
set @TuNgay = '01/01/2016' set @DenNgay = '31/12/2016'
declare @NgayChot as datetime -- set @NgayChot = '01/08/2017' set @NgayChot = '01/01/2017'
DECLARE @tblKQ as table( ID int, ttcMa nvarchar(50), TamUngDauKy float, ConPhaiThuDauKy float, TamUngTrongKy float, PhanboTamungTrongky float, PhaiThuTrongKy float, DaThuTrongKy float, HoanTamUngTrongKy float, HoanTamUngTrongKyTC1 float, UngTruocCuoiKy float, ConPhaiThuCuoiKy float )
insert into @tblKQ(Id,ttcMa) SELECT Id,ttcMa FROM KHACHHANG
update tbl
set -- KH tạm ứng trước = Tổng Kh tạm ứng trước (TC0) (đến thời điểm A) – chi phân bổ (đến thời điểm A) – Hoàn tạm ứng (đến thời điểm A). TamUngDauKy = case when (@TuNgay < Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,'1/1/2017',103),103)) then 0 else ( select isnull(sum(SoTien*TyGia),0) from chi where MucDich = 210 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = tbl.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) < @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) >= @NgayChot) + (select isnull(sum(SoTien*TyGia),0) from UNC where MucDich = 210 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = tbl.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) < @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) >= @NgayChot) + isnull((select TamUng from congnohethongdauky where idKH = tbl.id and TrangThai = 0), 0) - (select isnull(sum(PhanBoTamUng),0) from phieunhapkho where IDkhachhang = tbl.Id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgayThang,103),103) < @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgayThang,103),103) >= @NgayChot) - (select isnull(sum(SoTien*TyGia),0) from thu where MucDich = 109 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = tbl.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) < @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) >= @NgayChot) - (select isnull(sum(SoTien*TyGia),0) from thunh where MucDich = 109 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = tbl.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) < @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) >= @NgayChot) end,
-- Còn nợ (trước 1/1/2017) + Số phải chi ( tống tất cả các giá trị xuất kho) - chi phân bổ – chi ngân hàng (chi cho XK) – chi tiền mặt (chi cho XK) - Chi hoàn cho XK TC1 ConPhaiThuDauKy = case when (@TuNgay < Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,'1/1/2017',103),103)) then isnull((select ConThieu from congnohethongdauky where idKH = tbl.id and TrangThai = 0 and Nam = year(@NgayChot)), 0) else isnull((select ConThieu from congnohethongdauky where idKH = tbl.id and TrangThai = 0 and Nam = year(@NgayChot)), 0) + (select isnull(sum(Tientruocthue+Tienthue),0) from phieunhapkho where IdKhachHang = tbl.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) < @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) >= @NgayChot)
- (select isnull(sum(PhanBoTamUng),0) from phieunhapkho where IDkhachhang = tbl.Id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgayThang,103),103) < @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgayThang,103),103) >= @NgayChot) - (select isnull(sum(SoTien*TyGia),0) from chi where MucDich = 210 and replace(PhieuTC1,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = tbl.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) < @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) >= @NgayChot) - (select isnull(sum(SoTien*TyGia),0) from UNC where MucDich = 210 and replace(PhieuTC1,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = tbl.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) < @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) >= @NgayChot) + (select isnull(sum(SoTien*TyGia),0) from thu where MucDich = 109 and replace(PhieuTC1,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = tbl.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) < @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) >= @NgayChot) + (select isnull(sum(SoTien*TyGia),0) from thunh where MucDich = 109 and replace(PhieuTC1,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = tbl.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) < @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) >= @NgayChot) end ,
-- Kh tạm ứng trước (TC0) – chi phân bổ (chi tính trong khoảng A -> B) TamUngTrongKy = (select isnull(sum(SoTien*TyGia),0) from chi where MucDich = 210 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = tbl.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay) + (select isnull(sum(SoTien*TyGia),0) from UNC where MucDich = 210 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = tbl.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay),
-- Phân bổ tạm ứng PhanboTamungTrongky = (select isnull(sum(PhanBoTamUng),0) from phieunhapkho where IDkhachhang = tbl.Id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgayThang,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay),
-- Tổng giá trị các xuất kho (chi tính trong khoảng A -> B) PhaiThuTrongKy = (select isnull(sum(Tientruocthue+Tienthue),0) from phieunhapkho where IdKhachHang = tbl.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay) + (select isnull(sum(SoTien*TyGia),0) from THU where MucDich = 106 and Idkh = tbl.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay) + (select isnull(sum(SoTien*TyGia),0) from THUNH where MucDich = 106 and Idkh = tbl.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay) ,
-- chi tiền mặt (chi cho XK) + chi ngân hàng (chi cho XK) (chi tính trong khoảng A -> B) DaThuTrongKy = (select isnull(sum(SoTien*TyGia),0) from chi where MucDich = 210 and replace(PhieuTC1,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = tbl.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay) + (select isnull(sum(SoTien*TyGia),0) from UNC where MucDich = 210 and replace(PhieuTC1,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = tbl.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay) + (select isnull(sum(SoTien*TyGia),0) from chi where MucDich = 229 and Idkh = tbl.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay) + (select isnull(sum(SoTien*TyGia),0) from UNC where MucDich = 229 and Idkh = tbl.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay),
-- phiếu thu có mục đích hoàn tạm ứng (chi tính trong khoảng A -> B) HoanTamUngTrongKy = (select isnull(sum(SoTien*TyGia),0) from thu where MucDich = 109 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = tbl.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythangct,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay) +(select isnull(sum(SoTien*TyGia),0) from thunh where MucDich = 109 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = tbl.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay),
HoanTamUngTrongKyTC1 = (select isnull(sum(SoTien*TyGia),0) from thu where MucDich = 109 and replace(PhieuTC1,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = tbl.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythangct,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay) + (select isnull(sum(SoTien*TyGia),0) from thunh where MucDich = 109 and replace(PhieuTC1,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = tbl.id and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay)
from @tblKQ tbl
-- Xoa du lieu chia delete from @tblKQ where TamUngDauKy + ConPhaiThuDauKy + TamUngTrongKy + PhanboTamungTrongky + PhaiThuTrongKy + DaThuTrongKy + HoanTamUngTrongKy + HoanTamUngTrongKyTC1 = 0
-- CUOI KY ----------------- -- KH tạm ứng trước = Tổng Kh tạm ứng trước (TC0) (đến thời điểm B) – chi phân bổ (đến thời điểm B) – Hoàn tạm ứng (đến thời điểm B). update @tblKQ SET UngTruocCuoiKy = TamUngDauKy + TamUngTrongKy - PhanboTamungTrongky - HoanTamUngTrongKy, ConPhaiThuCuoiKy = ConPhaiThuDauKy + PhaiThuTrongKy - DaThuTrongKy - PhanboTamungTrongky + HoanTamUngTrongKyTC1
select * from @tblKQ order by ttcMa asc

data.name: txtChiTietCongNoPhaiTra.EditValue
data.value:
--chi tiet cong no phai tra declare @TuNgay as datetime declare @DenNgay as datetime declare @IdKH as int
set dateformat dmy
set @TuNgay = '01/01/2016' set @DenNgay = '31/12/2016'
declare @NgayChot as datetime set @NgayChot = '01/01/2017'
set @IdKH = 20 * 1 * 1 * 1
declare @tblKetQua as table( SoPhieu nvarchar(30), TenVatTu nvarchar(1500), Ngay datetime, SoTT int, MaVatTu nvarchar(500), DonViTinh nvarchar(30), SoLuong float, DonGia float, TienHang float, TienThue float, TongTienTamUng float, ConLaiTamUng float, PhatSinhNo float, PhatSinhCo float, LuyKe float, HanThu datetime, LoaiCT nvarchar(50), SapXep int, Ngay2 datetime, SoPhieu2 nvarchar(30), SoCG nvarchar(30), LoaiHoanTamUng int )
-- thông tin đầu kỳ -----------------
declare @LuyKeDauKy as float declare @ConPhaiThuDauKy as float declare @UngTruocDauKy as float
set @ConPhaiThuDauKy = (select isnull(sum(Tientruocthue+tienthue),0) from PHIEUNHAPKHO where IdKhachHang = @IdKH and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) < @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) >= @NgayChot) - (select isnull(sum(PhanBoTamUng),0) from PHIEUNHAPKHO where IDkhachhang = @IdKH and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgayThang,103),103) < @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgayThang,103),103) >= @NgayChot) - (select isnull(sum(SoTien*TyGia),0) from chi where MucDich = 210 and replace(PhieuTC1,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = @IdKH and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) < @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) >= @NgayChot) - (select isnull(sum(SoTien*TyGia),0) from unc where MucDich = 210 and replace(PhieuTC1,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = @IdKH and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) < @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) >= @NgayChot) + isnull((select ConThieu from congnohethongdauky where idKH = @IdKH and TrangThai = 0),0)
set @UngTruocDauKy = ( select isnull(sum(SoTien*TyGia),0) from chi where MucDich = 210 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = @IdKH and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) < @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) >= @NgayChot) + (select isnull(sum(SoTien*TyGia),0) from unc where MucDich = 210 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' and Idkh = @IdKH and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) < @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) >= @NgayChot) - (select isnull(sum(PhanBoTamUng),0) from PHIEUNHAPKHO where IDkhachhang = @IdKH and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgayThang,103),103) < @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgayThang,103),103) >= @NgayChot) - (select isnull(sum(SoTien*TyGia),0) from chi where MucDich = 109 and Idkh = @IdKH and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) < @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) >= @NgayChot) - (select isnull(sum(SoTien*TyGia),0) from unc where MucDich = 109 and Idkh = @IdKH and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) < @TuNgay and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) >= @NgayChot) + isnull((select TamUng from congnohethongdauky where idKH = @IdKH and TrangThai = 0),0)
set @LuyKeDauKy = @ConPhaiThuDauKy - @UngTruocDauKy
insert into @tblKetQua(TenVatTu,TongTienTamUng,PhatSinhCo,LuyKe) SELECT N' -- Đầu kỳ: ', @UngTruocDauKy, @ConPhaiThuDauKy, @LuyKeDauKy
-- Lấy thông tin thu tạm ứng -- insert into @tblKetQua(SoPhieu, TenVatTu, Ngay, TongTienTamUng, LoaiCT,SapXep,SoCG) select 'CHI ' + SoPhieu, DienGiai, NgaythangCT, SoTien*TyGia , N'Tạm ứng TM',1,PhieuTC0 from CHI WHERE Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay AND MucDich = 210 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' AND IdKH = @IdKH
insert into @tblKetQua(SoPhieu, TenVatTu, Ngay, TongTienTamUng, LoaiCT,SapXep,SoCG) select 'UNC ' + SoPhieu, DienGiai, Ngaythang, SoTien*TyGia, N'Tạm ứng NH',2,PhieuTC0 from UNC WHERE Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang ,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay AND MucDich = 210 and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '' AND IdKH = @IdKH
-- Lấy thông tin thu vay tiền có thời hạn -- insert into @tblKetQua(SoPhieu, TenVatTu, Ngay, PhatSinhCo, LoaiCT,SapXep,SoCG) select 'PT ' + SoPhieu, DienGiai, NgaythangCT, SoTien*TyGia , N'Vay tiền TM',1,PhieuTC0 from THU WHERE Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay AND MucDich = 106 AND IdKH = @IdKH
insert into @tblKetQua(SoPhieu, TenVatTu, Ngay, PhatSinhCo, LoaiCT,SapXep,SoCG) select 'NT ' + SoPhieu, DienGiai, NgaythangCT, SoTien*TyGia, N'Vay tiền NH',2,PhieuTC0 from THUNH WHERE Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT ,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay AND MucDich = 106 AND IdKH = @IdKH
-- Lấy thông tin trả tiền vay -- insert into @tblKetQua(SoPhieu, TenVatTu, Ngay, PhatSinhNo, LoaiCT,SapXep,SoCG) select 'CHI ' + SoPhieu, DienGiai, NgaythangCT, SoTien*TyGia , N'Trả tiền vay TM',1,PhieuTC0 from CHI WHERE Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay AND MucDich = 229 AND IdKH = @IdKH
insert into @tblKetQua(SoPhieu, TenVatTu, Ngay, PhatSinhNo, LoaiCT,SapXep,SoCG) select 'UNC ' + SoPhieu, DienGiai, Ngaythang, SoTien*TyGia, N'Trả tiền vay NH',2,PhieuTC0 from UNC WHERE Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang ,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay AND MucDich = 229 AND IdKH = @IdKH
-- Lấy thông tin tiền xuất kho ------- insert into @tblKetQua(SoPhieu, Ngay, TenVatTu,DonViTinh,MaVatTu,SoLuong,DonGia,TienHang,SoTT,TienThue,LoaiCT,SapXep,SoCG) SELECT 'NK ' + PHIEUNHAPKHO.Sophieu, PHIEUNHAPKHO.Ngaythang, TENVATTU.ten AS TenVatTu, TENDONVITINH.TEN AS DonViTinh, VATTU.Model, NHAPKHO.Soluong, NHAPKHO.Dongia, (NHAPKHO.Soluong * NHAPKHO.Dongia)ThanhTien, NHAPKHO.AZ AS Stt, (case when NHAPKHO.Nhapthue = 1 then (SoLuong * DonGia) * (MucThue / 100.0) else 0 end)TienThue, N'Xuất kho',6,SophieuDH FROM NHAPKHO LEFT OUTER JOIN VATTU LEFT OUTER JOIN TENDONVITINH ON VATTU.IDDonvitinh = TENDONVITINH.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TENVATTU ON VATTU.IDTenvattu = TENVATTU.ID ON NHAPKHO.IDvattu = VATTU.ID RIGHT OUTER JOIN PHIEUNHAPKHO ON NHAPKHO.Sophieu = PHIEUNHAPKHO.Sophieu where PHIEUNHAPKHO.IdKhachHang = @IdKH AND Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,PHIEUNHAPKHO.NgayThang,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay
-- Lấy thông tin xuất kho công trình --- --insert into @tblKetQua(SoPhieu, Ngay, TenVatTu,SoLuong,DonGia,TienHang,SoTT,TienThue,LoaiCT,SapXep,SoCG) --select 'XK ' + PHIEUNHAPKHO.SoPhieu,Ngaythang,NoiDung,SoLuong,DonGia, (XUATKHOAUX.Soluong * XUATKHOAUX.Dongia), ---1,(case when XUATKHOAUX.Xuatthue = 1 then (SoLuong * DonGia) * (MucThue / 100.0) else 0 end), N'Xuất kho CT',7,SophieuDH --FROM PHIEUNHAPKHO INNER JOIN XUATKHOAUX ON XUATKHOAUX.Sophieu = PHIEUNHAPKHO.Sophieu --WHERE PHIEUNHAPKHO.IdKhachHang = @IdKH AND --Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,PHIEUNHAPKHO.NgayThang,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay
-- Lấy tiền thu phân bổ ------------ insert into @tblKetQua(SoPhieu,Ngay,PhatSinhCo,LoaiCT,SapXep,SoCG,TenVatTu) (select 'PB ' + SoPhieu,NgayThang,PhanBoTamUng,N'Phân bổ',3,SophieuDH, (select GiaiThich from DM_HINH_THUC_TT where id = (select IDHinhThucTT2 from PHIEUDATHANG where Sophieu = SophieuDH)) from PHIEUNHAPKHO where IDkhachhang = @IdKH and PhanBoTamUng <> 0 and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgayThang,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay)
-- Hoàn tạm ứng TC1-------------------- insert into @tblKetQua(SoPhieu,Ngay,TenVatTu,PhatSinhCo,LoaiCT,SapXep,SoCG,LoaiHoanTamUng) (select 'HTM ' + SoPhieu, NgayThangCT,DienGiai, SoTien*TyGia,N'Hoàn tạm ứng TM',10, (SELECT SophieuDH from PHIEUNHAPKHO WHERE SoPhieu = PhieuTC1),1 from thu where MucDich = 109 and IdKh = @IdKH and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay and replace(PhieuTC1,'0','') <> '')
insert into @tblKetQua(SoPhieu,Ngay,TenVatTu,PhatSinhCo,LoaiCT,SapXep,SoCG,LoaiHoanTamUng) (select 'HNH ' + SoPhieu, NgayThangct,DienGiai, SoTien*TyGia,N'Hoàn tạm ứng NH',11, (SELECT SophieuDH from PHIEUNHAPKHO WHERE SoPhieu = PhieuTC1),1 from THUNH where MucDich = 109 and IdKh = @IdKH and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythangct,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay and replace(PhieuTC1,'0','') <> '')
-- Hoàn tạm ứng TC0-------------------- insert into @tblKetQua(SoPhieu,Ngay,TenVatTu,PhatSinhCo,LoaiCT,SapXep,SoCG,LoaiHoanTamUng) (select 'HTM ' + SoPhieu, NgayThangCT,DienGiai,SoTien*TyGia,N'Hoàn tạm ứng TM',10, PhieuTC0,0 from THU where MucDich = 109 and IdKh = @IdKH and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '')
insert into @tblKetQua(SoPhieu,Ngay,TenVatTu,PhatSinhCo,LoaiCT,SapXep,SoCG,LoaiHoanTamUng) (select 'HNH ' + SoPhieu, NgayThangct,DienGiai, SoTien*TyGia,N'Hoàn tạm ứng NH',11, PhieuTC0,0 from THUNH where MucDich = 109 and IdKh = @IdKH and Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythangct,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay and replace(PhieuTC0,'0','') <> '')
-- Chi nhập kho ------------------- insert into @tblKetQua(SoPhieu, TenVatTu, Ngay, PhatSinhNo, LoaiCT,SapXep,SoCG) select 'CHI ' + SoPhieu, DienGiai, NgaythangCT, SoTien*TyGia, N'Thu xuất kho TM',8, (select SophieuDH from PHIEUNHAPKHO where sophieu = PhieuTC1) from CHI WHERE Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,NgaythangCT,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay AND MucDich = 210 and replace(PhieuTC1,'0','') <> '' AND IdKH = @IdKH
insert into @tblKetQua(SoPhieu, TenVatTu, Ngay, PhatSinhNo, LoaiCT,SapXep,SoCG) select 'UNC ' + SoPhieu, DienGiai, Ngaythang, SoTien*TyGia, N'Thu xuất kho NH',9, (select SophieuDH from PHIEUNHAPKHO where sophieu = PhieuTC1) from UNC WHERE Convert(datetime,CONVERT(nvarchar,Ngaythang,103),103) between @TuNgay and @DenNgay AND MucDich = 210 and replace(PhieuTC1,'0','') <> '' AND IdKH = @IdKH
-- tạo phiếu xuất kho tổng bên cột phát sinh nợ ---------------------------------------------
insert into @tblKetQua(SoPhieu,Ngay,PhatSinhCo,LoaiCT,SapXep,SoCG) select SoPhieu,Ngay,SUM(TienHang+TienThue),N'Phiếu XK',4,SoCG from @tblKetQua where LoaiCT = N'Xuất kho' or LoaiCT = N'Xuất kho CT' group by SoPhieu,Ngay,SoCG
update @tblKetQua set Ngay2 = Ngay, SoPhieu2 = SoPhieu
update @tblKetQua set SoPhieu = SoTT, Ngay = null where LoaiCT = N'Xuất kho' or LoaiCT = N'Xuất kho CT'
-- trừ tạm ứng còn lại sau phiếu thu phân bổ ---------------------------------------------- --insert into @tblKetQua(TenVatTu,LoaiCT,SapXep,Ngay2,SoPhieu2,SoTT,SoCG) --select N'T.Ứ CG' + SoCG + N' còn lại' ,N'Tạm ứng còn lại',4,Ngay2,SoPhieu2,-1,SoCG from @tblKetQua where LoaiCT = N'Phân bổ'
select * from @tblKetQua order by Ngay2,SoPhieu2,SapXep,SoTT,LoaiCT
